extension.description:
Simple Joomla UnifiedPurse Donation Plugin

Thank you for installing Simple Joomla UnifiedPurse Donation Plugin. This module is a customizable plugin to enable UnifiedPurse Payment method on your Joomla content. The following features are available:

  • Allow you to enter your merchant-id
  • Allow you to enter your store-id
  • Return address (URL) when payment is complete
  • To view the buy now button on your article add this TAG to your content {wpunifiedpursedonation}{/wpunifiedpursedonation}

    • Visit https://unifiedpurse.com for details.



    Thanks!
    UnifiedPurse Donation plugin for Joomla by UnifiedPurse
